title: [CLIENT] Gun Goddess Miss Fortune Limited Bundle Portrait Icon Doesn't Change Profile Background
body: The Gun Goddess Miss Fortune Limited Bundle Portrait Icon doesn't change the dynamic background in your profile page when equipped. The normal 4 icons do, but as this is also a skin specific icon included in the bundle, and easily the best looking icon, it should also cause the dynamic background in your profile to change to the animated Gun Goddess Miss Fortune splash art. I am sure this is a bug, as you couldn't possibly have intended for a limited bundle icon associated with the skin to not change the dynamic profile background.

replies.body: Hey! This is 100% a bug and we're working to get a fix into the client ASAP!

I checked DJ Sona and Elementalist Lux and neither of these skins have this issue.
